name: Breaded Pork Tenderloin
author: Dani
summary: This is the most tender, tasty recipe for pork tenderloin.
ingredients: ½ cup Italian-style dried bread crumbs
directions: Place rounds between sheets of plastic wrap and pound until thin
Preheat oven to 325 degrees F (165 degrees C)
Beat eggs and milk together and pour into a shallow dish or bowl
In a separate dish or bowl combine breadcrumbs with garlic salt, oregano, salt and pepper
In a large skillet heat oil over medium high heat
Meanwhile, dip tenderloins in egg mixture, then coat with bread crumb mixture
When oil is hot, add coated tenderloin to skillet and fry until golden brown on both sides (not cooked through)! Place browned tenderloin in a 9x13 inch baking dish lined with aluminum foil
Fry any leftover eggs and bread crumbs together for 'breadings'
Cover tightly and bake in the preheated oven for about 45 minutes or until meat has reached an internal temperature of 145 degrees F (63 degrees C)
